plants.description:
Monstera Adansonii is a tropical plant from the monstera family.
It is similar to her sister, the Monstera Deliciosa, but it features smaller leaves.
Monstera Adansonii is a perfect plant for beginners.

Pilea Peperomioides is a green plant typically from China.
It requires a well drained soil and loves a partial shade.
Pilea Peperomioides can be reproduced either by propagation or by root division.
Gaillardia is a perennial flower plant. from may to september this plant grows flowers similar to daisies, but in colors ranging from yellow, to red and brown. Impollinators love them.
